headline.print_headline: About a Dozen People Hurt When Deck Collapses
headline.main: About a Dozen People Hurt When Deck Collapses

docs.snippet: Fire officials say a deck collapsed during a house party in suburban Atlanta and about a dozen people were injured, including several people who were burned by a grill....
docs.lead_paragraph: Fire officials say a deck collapsed during a house party in suburban Atlanta and about a dozen people were injured, including several people who were burned by a grill.

headline.print_headline: Forces of Renegade Libyan General Demand Parliament Hand Over Power
headline.main: Forces of Renegade Libyan General Demand Parliament Hand Over Power

docs.snippet: Forces loyal to renegade Libyan general Khalifa Hafter demanded parliament freeze work and hand over power to a body drafting a new constitution, according to a statement issued late on Sunday after the assembly building was stormed....
docs.lead_paragraph: Forces loyal to renegade Libyan general Khalifa Hafter demanded parliament freeze work and hand over power to a body drafting a new constitution, according to a statement issued late on Sunday after the assembly building was stormed.

headline.print_headline: Harrison Helps Pirates to DH Split With Yankees
headline.main: Harrison Helps Pirates to DH Split With Yankees

docs.snippet: Josh Harrison homered in the seventh inning to make up for a baserunning blunder and made a diving catch in left field to help preserve the Pittsburgh Pirates' first win in the Bronx in 54 years, 5-3 over the New York Yankees on Sunday for a doubl...
docs.lead_paragraph: Josh Harrison homered in the seventh inning to make up for a baserunning blunder and made a diving catch in left field to help preserve the Pittsburgh Pirates' first win in the Bronx in 54 years, 5-3 over the New York Yankees on Sunday for a doubleheader split.

headline.print_headline: Wiggins Easily Wins Tour of California
headline.main: Wiggins Easily Wins Tour of California

docs.snippet: Bradley Wiggins cruised to victory in the Tour of California on Sunday as fellow Briton Mark Cavendish won the final stage around Thousand Oaks....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bradley Wiggins cruised to victory in the Tour of California on Sunday as fellow Briton Mark Cavendish won the final stage around Thousand Oaks.

headline.print_headline: Racism Claim Dooms Bid to Honor Mark Twain in NV
headline.main: Racism Claim Dooms Bid to Honor Mark Twain in NV

docs.snippet: A state panel has effectively killed a bid to name a Lake Tahoe cove for Mark Twain, citing opposition from a tribe that says he held racist views on Native Americans....
docs.lead_paragraph: A state panel has effectively killed a bid to name a Lake Tahoe cove for Mark Twain, citing opposition from a tribe that says he held racist views on Native Americans.

headline.print_headline: Bolivian Soccer Club Signs on President as Player
headline.main: Bolivian Soccer Club Signs on President as Player

docs.snippet: A Bolivian first-division soccer club has come up with a great marketing ploy: The Sports Boys team says it has signed on the country's president, Evo Morales, to suit up and play about 20-30 minutes per match....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Bolivian first-division soccer club has come up with a great marketing ploy: The Sports Boys team says it has signed on the country's president, Evo Morales, to suit up and play about 20-30 minutes per match.

headline.print_headline: Deutsche Bank Appoints Syndicate for Rights Issue: Sources
headline.main: Deutsche Bank Appoints Syndicate for Rights Issue: Sources

docs.snippet: Deutsche Bank has appointed a syndicate of other banks to run the its multi-billion euro rights issue, two sources familiar with the matter said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank has appointed a syndicate of other banks to run the its multi-billion euro rights issue, two sources familiar with the matter said on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Tamils Say Barred From Commemorating War Dead, Sri Lanka Denies
headline.main: Tamils Say Barred From Commemorating War Dead, Sri Lanka Denies

docs.snippet: Minority ethnic Tamils said on Sunday they had been banned from commemorating the deaths of their relatives five years ago in the final battle of a 26-year war with Sri Lanka's military, a charge denied by the army....
docs.lead_paragraph: Minority ethnic Tamils said on Sunday they had been banned from commemorating the deaths of their relatives five years ago in the final battle of a 26-year war with Sri Lanka's military, a charge denied by the army.

headline.print_headline: Lampard Named England Vice-Captain in Brazil
headline.main: Lampard Named England Vice-Captain in Brazil

docs.snippet: Frank Lampard will be England's vice-captain at next month's World Cup in Brazil, manager Roy Hodgson said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Frank Lampard will be England's vice-captain at next month's World Cup in Brazil, manager Roy Hodgson said on Sunday.
